title: Daily routine 2
sentences: a casa a las seis de la tarde.
Normally I return home at six in the evening.
The first thing I do is prepare dinner.
I like to cook something healthy every day.
After dinner, I have to wash the dishes.
a mi compañero a limpiar la cocina.
Sometimes I help my partner clean the kitchen.
a pasear al perro por el parque.
I have to take the dog out for a walk in the park.
el polvo de los muebles los martes.
I usually dust (clean the dust from) the furniture on Tuesdays.
I like to tidy the living room before sleeping.
con la ropa sucia de la semana.
I put on the washing machine with the week's dirty clothes.
I have to hang the clothes on the balcony.
un libro en el sofá para relajarme.
I like to read a book on the sofa to relax.
Sometimes I watch a series on television.
escuchar música tranquila por la noche.
I love listening to quiet music at night.
Before going to bed, I undress in my room.
I put on my pajamas because it is very soft.
todas las luces de la casa.
I always turn off all the lights in the house.
I lock the door for safety.
normalmente a las once de la noche.
I usually go to bed at eleven at night.
con la ventana un poco abierta.
I like to sleep with the window slightly open.
I almost always fall asleep right away.
durante la noche por el ruido.
Sometimes I wake up during the night because of the noise.
I have to set (put) the alarm clock for tomorrow.
mucho cuando leo en la cama.
I relax a lot when I read in bed.
It is important to rest eight hours every night.
Tomorrow will be a very busy day.
el reloj antes de entrar en la cama.
I take off my watch before getting into bed.
I drink a glass of water if I am thirsty.
Sometimes we dream about very strange things.
Tomorrow I have to get up very early.
dictionary:
Volver - To return
Preparar - To prepare
Cocinar - To cook
Lavar - To wash
Ayudar - To help
Sacar a pasear - To take for a walk
Limpiar el polvo - To dust
Ordenar - To tidy
La lavadora - The washing machine
Tender - To hang (clothes)
Leer - To read
Ver - To watch / see
Encantar - To love (things)
Desvestirse - To undress
El pijama - The pajamas
Apagar - To turn off
La puerta - The door
Acostarse - To go to bed
Dormir - To sleep
Dormirse - To fall asleep
Despertarse - To wake up
Poner el despertador - To set the alarm
Relajarse - To relax
Descansar - To rest
El día - The day
Quitarse - To take off
El vaso - The glass
Soñar - To dream
Madrugar - To get up early
Buenas noches - Good night
